price: Ṣùgbọ́n (ìyà Iná) yóò bá wọn ní òjijì, nígbà náà ó máa kó ìdààmú bá wọn; wọn kò sì níí lè dá a padà. A kò sì níí sún (ìyà náà) síwájú fún wọn.
arabic: بَلۡ تَأۡتِيهِم بَغۡتَةٗ فَتَبۡهَتُهُمۡ فَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ رَدَّهَا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنظَرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
